scenes.one_liner: Ela’s isolated radio tent glows under moonlight on deserted highway at night.
Ela urgently relays Marcus’s distress over radio inside the tent at night.
Flashback shows Marcus struggling with damaged spacecraft amid flickering sparks.
Ela receives coordinates from Marcus and alerts Sheriff Miller for rescue.
Sheriff Miller drives down Desolation Road, closing in on Marcus’s crash site.
Ela and Sheriff Miller find injured Marcus, offering hope with first aid.
At dawn, Ela reflects on Marcus’s survival as AI signals extraction readiness.
